term.title: deflocculation

item.text: The reversal of coagulation or flocculation, i.e. the dispersion of aggregates to form a colloidally stablesuspension or emulsion.

sources.item: PAC, 1972, 31, 577. 'Manual of Symbols and Terminology for Physicochemical Quantities and Units, Appendix II: Definitions, Terminology and Symbols in Colloid and Surface Chemistry' on page 610 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197231040577)
